text: Hi guys, I try to use React, but I found some trouble, In boilerplate I have just 1 fields.json, I want to use React router and I want to use different modules on pages. It means that I have 1 fields.json for whole application and if I switch page I continue see in left menu (in cms where I change values in modules) modes for modules that are absent on page? though I don't have to see it. Help pls
or maybe send some links to github repos that uses React. I'd be useful for me too (except default boilerplate)
Hi guys. Is it possible to use React dependencies in HubSpot?
